alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:44PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lewis and Clark and northern Jefferson Counties through 1145 PM MDT... At 1043 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Warm Springs, or 14 miles northwest of Butte, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helena, Boulder, East Helena, Montana City, Basin, Wickes, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Elkhorn State Park, Marysville, Clancy, Canyon Creek and Jefferson City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 140 220. Highway 12 between mile markers 29 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
